website_summaries.verdict: The top choice for those looking for a powerful and high-quality winch.
pros: Comes in a variety of capacities, from 2,000 pound to 4,000 pound
Pulling is fast and powerful, while the operation overall is smooth and quiet
Has 2 remotes for ease of use and safety
cons: A particularly weak spot here is the cable, which is prone to fraying and breaking

customer_reviews.title: The seller is great, the shipping was fast
customer_reviews.text: The first day out plowing, the cable on this winch snapped. It was lifting a 48" plow blade with 6 inches of powdery snowfall. It broke about 6" above the hook. I never saw a cable snap before accept when my buddy was pulling out a jeep that was stuck 3 feet deep in mud. The seller is great, the shipping was fast, but disappointed in WARN for not making a better cable. This should not have happened for the life of the winch. Would I say not buy this winch? Heck no, it works great, but be prepared to have a spare cable handy in a snow storm.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for a worn-out Warn winch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Warn winch CE 4.0 that was 10 years old. The previous one was mounted onto the front hitch of a Polaris Ranger UTV and then I switched it to the front of a Kubota X900 RTV. The motor finally gave out so this new one is now on the front hitch of my RTV. i didn't have to replace any of the wiring from the old winch - just swapped out the winch itself. No need to change bolt holes, either. So far (after a few uses over the past couple of weeks) it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicentino

customer_reviews.title: Hooks are not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 20 of these Vantage winches and think they are great. It is important to know that they came with a 1/4 hook instead of the 5/16 hook shown on the package and web pictures. I called Warn to let them know I wanted the hooks as advertised and they shipped them immediately. Warn told me they will now come with the smaller hook and are working on changing the literature.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Stock

customer_reviews.title: DON"T buy this one!  Worked for 5 minutes. Won't power out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this winch because WARN is supposed to be good quality. It worked properly for about 5 minutes, then it refuses to power out. Solenoid is fine. Winch clicks hard, but will not power out. It will power in okay, but is actually noisy inside, like it's running rough. Seems to be a piece of crap. I've had a lot of winches and this one is just bad. Don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: coastal

customer_reviews.title: Cable broke after one winter
customer_reviews.text: Great winch, junk cable. Amazon would have replaced it, but I would have had to remove the entire winch to send it back. Too much of a hassle. Bought an inexpensive synthetic rope, and it has been working like a champ ever since.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, fast and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Great winch and I love the synthetic wire. Very fast and quiet; I've only pulled my Honda Pioneer 1000 out once but was very happy with the performance. Tad pricey but it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Moore

customer_reviews.title: went perfect with the Warn Advantage plow set up on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cheap winch for my Polaris sportsman thing died first season. This Warn is the real thing, went perfect with the Warn Advantage plow set up on my quad.
customer_reviews.author: Polo dee

customer_reviews.title: Listed as new clearly not
customer_reviews.text: As of right now I'm giving this a high rating, but I am a bit disappointed. Seller listed as new, opened the box and clearly wire packaging was opened, solenoid looks as if it was installed and removed wires are dirty as if installed and loose screws in box. I will be installing this weekend to see if it works will post update later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warn suggested 2.5 replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 Yamaha Grizzly that had a 2.5 Warn winch break. Bought the new winch to replace it. Yet to try but it is on & set to go.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin W.

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it’s a warn!!! Works great, great quality and the synthetic rope is top quality
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: These winches are great for ATVs
customer_reviews.text: These winches are great for ATVs. I've installed three; one on each of my Honda Recon ATVs. The winch has easily pulled my ATV out of several mudholes and over steep terrain. Installation is straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMichen

customer_reviews.title: i love mine
customer_reviews.text: use it on my Kubota side by side on farm and it has performed very well
customer_reviews.author: D. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Great winch, I like the rope
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winch. I mainly use it to raise/lower a plow in the winter. The Polaris winch that came with the unit in 2010 finally quit this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line must be a warn!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need to wire and install winch.
customer_reviews.author: Justin V.

customer_reviews.title: Snow plowed
customer_reviews.text: Winch is working awesome. The reason I put 4 star vs. 5 star was instructions suck. I have been using winch on my quad for a snow plow. I do a lot of plowing on my property and winch never failed.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This winch is a beast. It's a Warn shouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This winch is a beast. It's a Warn shouldn't be a surprise. If you need power and simplicity this is the one. The 10 foot remote power switch is convenient for moving big trees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You do not get remote control with it you have to order that separate
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and multiple on a trailer for pulling up a scissors lift it is awesome. I ordered a remote control sweet
customer_reviews.author: PlowMaster

customer_reviews.title: High Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this winch, high quality, smooth operation. Perfect for the KFI mount on my XP1000.
customer_reviews.author: SSKevinSC

customer_reviews.title: The synthetic rope doesn’t work well in the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to hook up and works great . The rope I’m having issiues with . The first time I used it to plow it snapped . So I cut out 3foot section to plow with and the same thing happened again
customer_reviews.author: William Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great winch, but decided to return at this time..did not need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good winch.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Razor well, very strong winch. I think the price was good for a Warn winch. Really like the rope on it, way better than cable.
customer_reviews.author: Made in USA

customer_reviews.title: Works on my tilt car trailer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my car trailer.. fast and quiet.. pulls my fully caged race car up no issue..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warn is worth the money bought first one in 2000 still works
customer_reviews.author: Mark Webb

customer_reviews.title: Still working
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of use it is still working like a charm. This is installed on my Polaris Ranger Crew Diesel. No complaints, everything works like it should. I've never had a Warn Winch to break down on me.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry Finn

customer_reviews.title: $$$$ but works like a horse
customer_reviews.text: this Warn winch is awsome,I got this for my Honda Rancher 420 (2016) and it fits perfect and it works great Do not think about,Warn is quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victor H. Dornelles

customer_reviews.title: It does not fit a 2014 Polaris Razor without extra parts
customer_reviews.text: This product does not fit a 2014 Polaris Razor 1000XP4 without additional parts and adjustments to the parts supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish Warn had better directions. But all in all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Little harder to install than I thought. Wish Warn had better directions. But all in all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Rider

customer_reviews.title: Works great the only complaint is the free spool knob doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great the only complaint is the free spool knob doesn't engage and disengage as well as the higher end warn winch models
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Right size for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing. If it can't pull it then I shouldn't be messing with it.
customer_reviews.author: ArkansawyerAdam

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the winch for my husbands birthday. We installed the winch on his Can Am 4 wheeler. We had to use it twice the in the same day to pull another 4 wheeler from the mud. On the second use, the cable frayed & unraveled. I would expect more from a winch that states it can handle 3000 lbs. Very disappointed in this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect description and awesome winch
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Great product, I have one on all of my ATVs.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to install (good instructions and all hardware needed) and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install (good instructions and all hardware needed) and works great. I like the thumb control so much better than the round switch the dealer installed that you had to reach for.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even realize this had the synthetic winch line until it was delivered. It works well and I have pull out a stuck 4 seat RZR with it already!
customer_reviews.author: Bealaddison

customer_reviews.title: It did not fit my application, Amazon had no ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit my application, Amazon had no trouble with me returning it, ordered the correct size works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Timely, works great
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Process of order, ship and install were flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Akins

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Strong winch. Easy to install. For Ranger Crew, order the correct Warn mounting plate (reference p/n on the Warn website, then order through Amazon. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: JackOfAllTrades

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Winch. Fit right on my 2009 Honda rubicon and is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Best Winch Available
customer_reviews.text: Excellent winch and simple installation on my Suzuki King Quad
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE C. BRONSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: A great product. I used it on my Yamaha grizzly. Works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Henning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but cable is a bit to thin in diameter and shows signs of wear with little use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it needs to be spooled carefully to keep it from stacking up on the spool.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great 3000lb winch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a worn out 3000K Superwinch. This winch pulls almost twice as fast, draws less on the charging system, and has two remotes. I love using the handlebar remotes while plowing snow, but when you're stuck in the mud, sometimes it's nicer to have the corded and be a safe distance off the seat in case of a line snap. It has worked flawlessly...I highly recommend this winch!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haroldson

customer_reviews.title: although Warn needs to be a wee bit more thorough in the wiring instructions (the brown contactor wire gets little to no love fr
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding little winches for our 2013 King Quad 400's so far. Installation wasn't as difficult as expected, although Warn needs to be a wee bit more thorough in the wiring instructions (the brown contactor wire gets little to no love from Warn). The provided wires were actually long enough to reach where they needed to be! I know, I was surprised too. Thank you Warn! Since this is our first venture with synthetic rope I'm hoping the pros outweigh the cons... fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I am usually disappointed with on-line purchases
customer_reviews.text: As a business owner and manager, I am usually disappointed with on-line purchases, However this product arrived quick, and it was safely packed in a secondary box. The unit had much more screws and connection cables and options than expected. I highly recommend the winch, And Amazon .com
customer_reviews.author: ALFRED CAMPOS

customer_reviews.title: Well built winch with alot of power!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this winch for my 2007 Kawasaki Brute Force 660 and it works great. I love this speed of this winch. While it is only rated at 2000 lb, it feels as if I can use it on much heavier duty tasks. It is a very well built winch and the packaging came with all the wiring which I did not expect because the listing did not mention that!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.M. Industries

customer_reviews.title: The delivery time frame was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The winch arrived and was exactly what I expected. Installation was simple as I was replacing a burned out winch. The delivery time frame was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Roza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: simply to install all bolts aligned ,perfect fit for the arctic cat had to drill some holes to mount the contactor.
customer_reviews.author: Ed e

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warn is the only brand I will run on my machines.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Alexander

customer_reviews.title: 2014 Honda Rancher TRX420 FPA
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Fit perfectly when used with a Warn winch mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. I installed it quickly. I had to use my old plate and drill new holes to install as the mounting plates were different. But it works great
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this winch to lift my swisher bucket on my ATV. Worked great for about a day, then the cable broke. Not once, but three times. It pulls a total of 24 inches or less and the bucket can only hold about 200 lbs of weight. Maybe I should have gone with the rope model, but a 3,000 lb winch should be able to pull a bucket back without constantly breaking the steel cable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works like a dream and was delivered a day before expected
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great addition to my UTV, using it for pulling logs among other things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and high quality. I tried a viper winch on a yamaha viking lately and had a lot of trouble. I cant even get a return call or email from them. Go with warn. Get the best first.
customer_reviews.author: DCW

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect heavy pulling ,
customer_reviews.text: I use these Winches all my trucks in my trucks . As a lifting winch on a arm , They work great . bogs down on heavy pull won't pull 900 pounds , They are rated at the first round of the spool , small spool at that , won't pull 1000 pounds . Maybe on wheels .
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: great product1
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very happy with the price and quality of this unit. I would definately recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: puppy luv

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great winch for the money all the quality from warn on a budget price . Put on my grizzly 700 works great
customer_reviews.author: Allen Beerman

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: Love this Warn winch. Great pulling power, small profile. I have it mounted in the back of my lawn care box truck to use for recovering mowers that break. The mowers weigh about 1200 pounds and this thing handles them with ease.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hiers

customer_reviews.title: Great winch!
customer_reviews.text: Great winch!!! I used this on my zipline to take the slack out of a 90' 1/4" steel cable line. Worked like a champ on the four wheeler. I installed it as well the instructions made it easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: The remote for the wench was missing. Please send replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be more specific for the model. Appears ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be more specific for the model. Appears to be a solid product. Zero issues installing on a Teryx4 for with a Warn bumper, no plate needed. Used it several times, pulls strong and keeps on chugging!!
customer_reviews.author: david859dr

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap to include enough wire
customer_reviews.text: It's a winch, and it works. That's the good part. The bad parts are 1) the wires that come with it are too short for anything but a small atv. They are barely the length of my sportsman 600 when stretched out, let alone any extra length to run them properly. 2) does not come with remote as some of the questions specifically ask and others answered that it does. Overall it's a bit under powered but works as you would expect for a smaller size winch. Install is pretty easy, minus the short wiring and lack of instructions about a jumper wire needed. I don't regret buying it, but probably wouldn't recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Warn 89031 Vantage 3000-S Winch
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's a Warn. Two year ago bought a cheaper brand and now replacing it. The universal mount fit my Yamaha like a glove. Been using the winch for about two months mainly for snow plowing. No issues ... very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ezzell

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Installation instructions are a little overwhelming at first, not always as clear as I would like. I did the installation in an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Great plow for price
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended to me to purchase this winch. I have used it all summer and love it. I plan on using it to lift my plow this winter.
customer_reviews.author: M. H

customer_reviews.title: Warn winch missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, had to order replacement parts from Warn winch supplier, Six States Distribution. At this point, I have spent more on this one than if I had purchased it locally at retail.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Winch is nice, everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Winch is nice, everything I expected. If there is one thing they could improve, it would be the length of power cables. No room to mount controller under seat had to put it in tool box behind seat. And cables were to short, bought longer cables from automotive store and ran them. Overall winch works well
customer_reviews.author: mike snyder

customer_reviews.title: Item mounted fairly easily. I had to drill new hole on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Item mounted fairly easily. I had to drill new hole on the mounting bracket to get to properly mounted, but other than that it was a simple process.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet installed winch. It is a Warn I do not expect any problem.
customer_reviews.author: "Milt"

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have used it a few times to get my grizzly out and it worked great. Maybe a little oversized for a yamaha grizzly but it works awesome, synthetic cable is a must
customer_reviews.author: Don Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: Warn Winch for ATV Snowplow
customer_reviews.text: Great Delivery time and everything was in order. We haven't installed it so don't know if the bolt pattern will work on our machine. We have to wait tile the snow clears from the snowplow stored outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M

customer_reviews.title: nice looking unit , but....
customer_reviews.text: used as a drop in replacement for 2000lb winch I took off a 2001 Polaris sportsman 500 ho. This new style looks to be sealed up well.the old one got water inside ruined the brush end.the holes needed to be drilled a little larger on the mounting plate , as they were off a small amount
customer_reviews.author: MIKE BADURA

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband for Father's day. We are very please with the quality of the winch. He is putting it to good use with our snowplow on the four wheeler this winter!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette G.

customer_reviews.title: The name Warn really say's it all.
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality of this product were immediately evident.. However, I did reorder and get the 4000lb. instead. A little more capacity never hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Directions could be a little better
customer_reviews.text: Installed on both my 2015 Honda Ranchers. Easy install. Directions could be a little better. You hang your 4-wheeler from a tree!!! Buried one in the creek and the other pulled it right out no problem. Just bought a third for new 2017. Warn- stands up to the reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, if price could have been lower I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: tbonetone

customer_reviews.title: 5 ci (warn) the original electrical was in good shape so i just replaced the winch assembly
customer_reviews.text: was replacing my old winch that had worn out.........it was a 2.5 ci (warn) the original electrical was in good shape so i just replaced the winch assembly.....works as advertised.....can get back to plowing snow with my atv
customer_reviews.author: William Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with the right mount. I put the contractor under the seat next to the battery. Running the wires is probably the hardest part. But, I'm not super-mechanical and I was able to do it in 3-4 hours. I put this on a 450 Grizzly. The only thing I'd recommend is to pull the side panels all the way off to help you wire it correctly. I tried to save time by just pulling them back but I ended out having to re do the wiring when I noticed it was right up against some hot parts.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Best Winch for money. Period
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this Warn winch over any other winch. Tried other cheap ones. Never again. Plan to buy another Warn in near future for another applicartion
customer_reviews.author: TimO

customer_reviews.title: I installed it on my Honda Rancher and I have abused it like no other
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tough!!!! I installed it on my Honda Rancher and I have abused it like no other, and it is still ticking.. I love Warn products, they make stuff tough. This winch is dependable and even if you overload it it still goes.. I was unearthing some poles on my property, I hooked up my ATV to my truck so the winch would not drag me, this winch not only pulled the ATV but it also dragged my F-150.. Crazy power!!!
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. Husband was able to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Husband was able to get it on himself.
customer_reviews.author: chrisco

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this winch as a replacement for a Yamaha Grizzly 400. The winch fit my atv very well with the exception of the fairlaine which I had to use different nuts and bolts on.
customer_reviews.author: Kurley Kahuna

customer_reviews.text: no happy with the rope , torn after second used , and is not covered by warranty to bad from WARN
customer_reviews.author: Customer17

customer_reviews.title: Argo
customer_reviews.text: Work great! I have it on the back of Argo. Pull ton of Rangers out of mud with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Monnin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Was relatively easy to install on my ATV
customer_reviews.text: Was relatively easy to install on my ATV. The power cables were much smaller gauge then the ones of the Warn 2500# winch that I was replacing which was a concern but all seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warn Vantage 4000 Winch.
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered one, but had a question on the best Warn two inch reciever mounts for that winch. Also just to make sure it comes with the wiring, what does that part include. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K. Baar

customer_reviews.title: Warn Winch
customer_reviews.text: Winch mounted easily. Electrical was easy to hook up. Winch works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I mounted this on a snow machine, drove about ...
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this on a snow machine, drove about 50 miles, used it once, and it has not worked since. I am returning it, which is a pain because I will need to disassemble some hardware that I mounted to the machine. I highly doubt the reliability of this winch in arctic conditions.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, installed in drop trailer for pulling and lowering large item on pallets.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: The winch is fine, delivery was quick
customer_reviews.text: The winch is fine, delivery was quick, package was missing key parts, included unneeded parts, very bad and misleading installation instructions. Took longer to install in my 2015 Kawasaki Mule than it should have. Battery cables were 8" too short!
customer_reviews.author: Karl W. Bundesen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Missing bag of bolts and nuts, have to go out and buy them
customer_reviews.author: brw

customer_reviews.text: Great winch until I submerged it in a mud hole. Now it won't free spool. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, it has the Warn warranty and general feel. However this model is foreign made, has a small cheap looking relay and the bolt holes did not align with the fairlead plate or the mount. Works as designed and is quiet compared to cheaper brands. Lets hope it lasts as long as we have come to expect from the Warn name!
customer_reviews.author: Cincited

customer_reviews.title: had it 2 years and its frozen up inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: had it 2 years and its frozen up inside the electrical works you can hear it trying. this means what was supposed to be water tight really is not. winch works when then rest of the system works. the solenoid as I would call it, basically the control unit, not the switch bit the actual relay is junk. fails 90 percent of the time. replacement from warn will cost they don't cover anything but the winch itself even though it is their control parts. will never buy warn again, customer service is not worth anything. nor is their willingness to stand by their product. buy something american. screw this Chinese outsourced crap.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: watch measurments for mounting
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to anyone purchasing this for a UTV. It will not fit the mounting brackets on UTV's. If you have a bumper with a mount then you can probably drill holes to fit. But if you plan on hiding it behind the radiator (like I was on my 2013 polaris rzr 800) then this winch won't fit. The holes on the winch for installation are two inches wider than the applicable mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: The Lozier Family

customer_reviews.title: are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this winch myself, in my 2009 Yamaha Grizzly 550. The project itself takes quite a bit of time and wiring (all included), and I was able to do the install with the help of a YouTube video and basic mechanic's tools. The quality and function of this winch, are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: G.

product_meta.title: WARN 89041 Vantage 4000-S Winch - 4000 lb. Capacity
product_meta.description: Size:Vantage 4000-SThe WARN Vantage line of powersports winches offers best-in-class performance at an affordable price in capacities ranging from 2,000-4,000 lbs. With features like smooth planetary gear trains, powerful permanent magnet motors, full sealing, and your choice of aircraft-grade wire rope or lightweight synthetic rope, WARN Vantage winches will help your ATV, Side x Side, and hard-earned dollars go further.
feature_bullets: Fully sealed motor and drive train to keep the elements out, three-stage planetary gear train for smooth, efficient operation
Mechanical spring brake for control while winching
Includes handlebar-mounted mini rocker switch and corded remote control
